violations.description: Ensure role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
violations.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  ARIA role presentation is not allowed for given element

Fix any of the following:
  ARIA role presentation is not allowed for given element

violations.description: Ensure elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
violations.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

nodes.html: <div aria-controls="language-picker-menu" aria-expanded="false" aria-label="language picker" class="language-picker language-picker-desktop" id="multilingual-language-picker-desktop" role="listbox" tabindex="0">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Required ARIA children role not present: group, option

violations.description: Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
violations.help: Frames must have an accessible name

nodes.html: <iframe id="vimeoplayer" src="//player.vimeo.com/video/1060792703?api=1&background=1" class="background-video" style="width: 1280px; height: 720px; left: 0px; top: 0px;"></iframe>
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has no title attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

nodes.html: <iframe id="vimeoplayer" src="//player.vimeo.com/video/1043637275?api=1&background=1" class="background-video" style="width: 1280px; height: 720px; left: 0px; top: -176px;"></iframe>

  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty

  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

violations.description: Ensure the order of headings is semantically correct
violations.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Heading order invalid

violations.help: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable
